unnormalised: Boro, tum Delhi-ak bhett diunk yevzon kortai? Tem borem asa! Tithe khub mhotvachi sorkari kacheri asat. Te sodunk thoddi tras zata, zago khanchi mhunn zanna naslear. Tumkam kitei sodunk podtta, nhoi?
normalised: Bore, tum Delhi-k vochpacho iojon kortat kai? Tem bhov borem! Thoinchea boreach mhotvachea sorkari kacherio asat. Punn tumak kitem sodunk zai tem kollonam zalear tim sodun kaddop thoddem trasdaik zavnk xokta. Tumkam kiteam tori sodunk poddttolem, barabor?

unnormalised: Udharonnak, Bharotachi Sonksod Sansad Marg, Novi Delhi, 110001 hanga asa. Tem Connaught Place lagin asa, mhunn tum metro ghevn magir ek auto-rickshaw gheun soktai. Sonksod margacher traffic khub asta peak hours-amni tem dhyan div. Bharotacho Uchcha Nialayo, Tilak Marg, Novi Delhi, 110201, ani ek mhotvachem zago asa, tumak bhett diunk avddi asteli. Tem India Gate lagin asa, mhunn tum donui bhett ekuch vatten korun soktai.
normalised: Zoxem ki, Bharoti-i Sonsod Sansod Marg, Novea Dilli, ekxim dha hozar ani ekacher asa. Tem Connaught Place-ache laginch asa, dekhun tumchea lagim metro ani magir auto-rickshaw gheunk zatlem. Punn sonsod rastacher boreach lokanchi gardi asta tem monant dovrat. Bharotachem Vochlolem Niayaloi, Tilok Marg, Nove Dilli, ekxim dha hozar donxim ani ek, hem anik ek mhotvachem nexonn asa jem tumhi bhett divpak sodtat. Tem India Gate-ak laginch asa, mhunn tumhi doni-i bhetti ekvotunk xoktat.

unnormalised: Tumkam Reserve Bank of India-k bhett diunk poddliar, tankanchi Delhi kacheri 6, Sansad Marg, Novi Delhi, 110001 hanga asa. Nemko porthun address tankun gheiat karan Sonksod Marg ani Parliament Street donui asat, donui khul'le soktat. Ani, tum Bharotacha Nivodnuk Aayogachi kacheri sodunk sodtaiar, ti Nirvachan Sadan, Ashok Road, Novi Delhi, 110001 hanga asa. Ti ekdam dhak dhakichea rostocher asa, mhunn tum galunk soddtokoch sodun dium.
normalised: Tumkam Reserve Bank of India-k vochop poddlem zalear, tanchi Delhi-chi kacheri che, Sansod Marg, Nove Dilli, ekxim dha hozar ani eka zagear asa. Tumkam ut’tar dobara-i tankhamnicho zago tankhamnichi rast ani sansod rast donui asat karonn tumhi dobara nischit korchem ki tem tumkam aspass zatlo. Ani zori tumhi Bharotachea Nivodnuk Ayogache kacheri sodpak provas korit asat, tor tem Nirvachan Sadan, Ashok Road, Nove Dilli, ekxim dha hozar ani eka zagear asa. Tem bori girbhi rastacher asa dekhun tumchea kodden zatlear tumchi gaddi dovrak zokhema porinnam soddpak boro.

unnormalised: Ani dhore tumkam Baheracho Mantraloyo-k bhett diunk zai? Tem South Block, Raisina Hill, Novi Delhi, 110011 hanga asa. Ho sogllo zago samanyapani bori rakhnuk korun aslolean ani surakchit aslolean, surakshechea tankun thodi tayari div. Vishvavidhyalaya Anudana Aayogachi (UGC) kacheri Bahadur Shah Zafar Marg, Novi Delhi, 110002 hanga asa tum shikxonnache vishayacher kam korchea velar.
normalised: Ani tumkam Videsh Montralayak bhett divpak zai mhonnu sangtat? Tem South Block, Raisina Hill, Nove Dilli, ekxim dha hozar ani ekache zagear asa. Ho puro zago sadharanponnan boro rakhun asta ani surakshit asta, dekhun suraksha tankhanchea probhavak toyar ravak. Viskhepit Grant Ayogache (U-G-C) kacheri Bahadur Shah Zafar Marg, Nove Dilli, ekxim dha hozar ani don zagear asa, tumhi xikxonn sambhallchea prosangacher asat zalear.

unnormalised: Mhunn tum dhyan div, Delhi-an khub mhotvachi sorkari ani sansthanchi address asat, tithe itle teguche vatten vatten pattun patlollean. Thoddich yevzon ani GPS-achi madot ghevn, tum tankam khub tras naslolean sodunk sakteli. Delhi-chea traffic-acher lakx divpache poddtelem, khas korun tum kacherichea vellar bhonvtani bhonvtolean. Tumchea proyasak Shubhecha!
normalised: Dekhun hoim, Delhi-k boreach mhotvachea sorkari ani samsthagotonchea tankhamniche zage visrun patll’leant. Thoddi-i yojonam ani thoddi G-P-S madotinchi madot, ani tumkam tankam sodun kaddunk chodd tras zaina. Delhi-chea yataiatacho probhav vicharat gheunk ugddas dovrat, khaskarun tumhi kacheri-chea vellancher provas kortat zalear. Tumchea proveasak subhechchha!
